thread.title: Top Ten Texts From Last Night Out of the 970, 2015 Edition
thread.title_full: Top Ten Texts From Last Night Out of the 970, 2015 Edition | Westword

author: Lindsey Bartlett
title: Top Ten Texts From Last Night Out of the 970, 2015 Edition
text:
Additional photos and more below. Thinkstock Earlier this year, we shared the 2015 editions of our favorite Texts From Last Night out of the 303 area code, as well as the 720 .
Which makes it 970's turn.
Our latest collection of 970 messages from the hilarious Texts From Last Night site are plenty weird: They feature bizarre bongs, disturbing cats, a broken pinkie promise and lots of sexy, drunken shenanigans.
Thank you for sharing. Count down our photo-illustrated top ten below.
EXPAND Thinkstock Number 10: The three keys to true love
YouTube Number 9: Good hygiene
EXPAND File photo Number 8: Hello, Kitty
Related Stories Top Ten Texts From Last Night Out of the 720, 2015 Edition Top Ten Texts From Last Night Out of the 303, 2015 Edition Photo by Eric Gruneisen Number 7: Best I Ever Had
YouTube Number 6: Shopping for necessities
EXPAND Thinkstock Number 5: Cleanup time
EXPAND Thinkstock Number 4: Strange promises
YouTube Number 3: Table for two
EXPAND Thinkstock Number 2: Serving time
EXPAND Thinkstock Number 1: Medical emergency
Contact: Michael Roberts Follow: Michael Roberts Westword Westword
